source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_SEQ_00<tab>The time has come for Lord Hien to return to Doma.
target: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_SEQ_00<tab>ナーマ砂漠北端のヒエンは、いよいよヤンサへ帰還するようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_000<tab>Let's go. Everyone is waiting for us back at the House of the Fierce!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_000シリナの想いや、この草原で感じたこと……
全部もって、ヤンサへ戻ろう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_005<tab>Heh heh...I wonder what Yugiri will have to say when we tell her of our adventures?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_005ユウギリも、今か今かと帰りを待っておろう。
大腕を振って、よい報せを持ち帰るでござる。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_010<tab>Right, then. To the House of the Fierce. With me, my friends!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_010では、これよりアジムステップを後にし、ヤンサへと帰還する。
……ゆくぞ、ゴウセツ、リセ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_015<tab>Err, remind me─what part of Yanxia is this again?
target: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_015<tab>ここは……ヤンサのどのあたりだろう？

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_020<tab>Ahh...this air that fills my breast, these sounds which resound in my ears. I am home.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_020ああ、この空気、まぎれもなく我が故郷……
懐かしのヤンサだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_030<tab>I have not used this road before, but... Ah. I recognize this place.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_030ふむ、この道は拙者もはじめて使ったが、
なるほど……この辺りに出るのでござるな。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_031<tab>The House of the Fierce should lie somewhere to the south. I will go on ahead and inform the sentries of our master's return.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_031であれば、目指す「烈士庵」は南の方角でござる。
どれ、拙者が先に行って、門兵と皆に若の帰還を告げておこう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_040<tab>Huh, I didn't realize there was another entrance.
target: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_040<tab>こっち側から烈士庵に入るのは、はじめてだね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_050<tab>Here we are! I wonder if they all are gathered inside, waiting...perhaps expecting a speech or some such...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_050おう、来たな。
わしも使うのは久方ぶりだが、
ここが烈士庵の出入り口のひとつだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_051<tab>Well! No matter! I shall have to do what I shall have to do!
target: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_051<tab>さあ、中に入って、皆に帰還を告げるとしよう！

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_060<tab>So...have we got a plan? Tell me someone's got a plan.
target: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_LYSE_000_060<tab>さて、これからどう動こうか……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALISAIE_000_065<tab>Alphinaud has been hard at work devising our strategy to seize Doma Castle. I'm sure he will be happy to share the details with you all shortly.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALISAIE_000_065具体的な作戦については、
アルフィノが説明してくれるはずよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_070<tab>No time to soak it in. We have work to do.
target: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HIEN_000_070<tab>烈士庵を懐かしんでおる暇はないな。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_YUGIRI_000_075<tab>Not that I doubted you for a moment, but I am relieved to see him returned.
target: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_YUGIRI_000_075<tab>よくヒエン様を連れて戻ってくれた。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_080<tab>All is in place. We need but commit to action and see it through to the end.
target: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_GOSETSU_000_080<tab>若が戻り、皆もいっそう覇気に満ちた様子でござる。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_YAGORO_000_085<tab>Lord Hien has returned! Lord Hien has returned! And together we will drive the imperials out of Doma once and for all!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_YAGORO_000_085ヒエン様が戻られる日が来ようとは……！
今度こそ、帝国からドマを取り戻してみせようぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HANAME_000_086<tab>I knew Lord Hien only by name and reputation until today. There is no denying that he has a presence...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_HANAME_000_086名前はもちろん存じ上げていましたが、
ヒエン様にお会いするのは、初めてなのです。
なんと凛々しいお方なのでしょう……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_090<tab>Once more, welcome back. It is good to see you again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_090改めて、君たちの帰還を祝おう。
……おかえり、)) (( )) 02 /var>。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>Ah, yes. There is another recent development we neglected to share with you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_091現状は先の報告どおりだが、
実はね、もうひとつ朗報があるんだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_092<tab>Alisaie and I have been hard at work attempting to restore the aetheryte here to its former glory...and I am pleased to inform you that we succeeded!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_092私とアリゼーと……
その道の権威だったムーンブリダが遺してくれた知識で、
どうにかエーテライトを復旧させることに成功した！

source: TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_093<tab>Suffice it to say, it should prove a boon for travel─well, for those replete with anima like you, at least...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA419_02518_ALPHINAUD_000_093これで、君も行動しやすくなるはずだ。
戦いはここから激化していく……
存分に役立ててもらえたら、私たちも嬉しいよ。
